li.a: MS STUCO Red Ribbon Week Sponsors

div.class: img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated wow animated pulse

div.p: THROUGH THE END OF SCHOOL YEAR - ALL ACTIVITIES AND EVENTS CANCELED UNTIL CLEARED BY CDC, STATE AND FEDERAL GOVERNMENT AND THE OSSAA

Subscribe to this calendar and get all school activities. Click on the arrow at the bottom of the calendar and then press SUBSCRIBE at the top of the calendar page. Follow the directions to add the school calendar to your calendar.

span.strong: The mission of Rush Springs Schools is to inspire and empower all students to achieve life-long success through a united community.

Rush Springs Public Schools is committed to delivering the highest quality of educational services. Believing schools, parents, students, and members of the community control the conditions of success, it is our charge to enable all students to learn and succeed now and in the future.
